q.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage
q.author: Anais Nin

q.quote: If the path is beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
q.author: Anatole France

q.quote: The seed of everything is in everything else.
q.author: Anaxagoras

q.quote: I am boring, I'm fine with boring.
q.author: Anderson Cooper

q.quote: I always say that kindness is the greatest beauty that you can have.
q.author: Andie MacDowell

q.quote: If you don't practice, you don't deserve to win.
q.author: Andre Agassi

q.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
q.author: Andre Gide

q.quote: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
q.author: Andre Maurois

q.quote: No one is perfect, and criticism is always welcome and expected.
q.author: Amitabh Bachchan

q.quote: A true teacher defends his students against his own personal influences.
q.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

q.quote: Questioning authority is, I think, a great thing to instill in children. I just didn't have enough of that when I was little.
q.author: Amy Chua

q.quote: I've always dreamed of growing up to be Amy Poehler.
q.author: Amy Poehler

q.quote: It's both rebellion and conformity that attack you with success.
Every bad situation is a blues song waiting to happen.
q.author: Amy Winehouse
